# beget_region (Data Source)

A single location for virtual server placement

## Selection Modes

1. **By ID**: Specify `id` to get exact region (e.g., `ru1`, `ru2`, `kz1`, `lv1`)
2. **By Filter**: Use `country` and/or `available` to filter regions. Returns the region with highest priority among matches.

## Example Usage
```terraform
# Get available region in Russia (highest priority)
data "beget_region" "russia_available" {
  country   = "RU"
  available = true
}
```
```terraform
# Get specific region by ID
data "beget_region" "spb" {
  id = "ru1"
}
```
<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `available` (Boolean)
- `country` (String)

### Read-Only

- `country_out` (String)
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `is_available` (Boolean)
- `name` (String)
- `name_en` (String)
- `out_id` (String)
- `priority` (Number)
- `short_name` (String)
